segments.text: Good morning , sir . Are you Mr . Wang , the personnel manager ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . Yes , I am . But I ’ m sorry I don ’ t think I know you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you don ’ t . My name is Liu Lili . I got the information from the TV that your department wants to hire a clerk , who will work under you . I would like to apply for the job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . We do have such a commercial . Sit down , please , Miss Liu . I ’ m glad to see you . Could you tell me about yourself first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I ’ m 24 this year . I earned my college diploma from the Night College of Foreign Languages Institute in 2010 . My major is English . Recently I ’ Ve also earned my degree in Secretarial Technology .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me about your work experience ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . I ’ Ve been working as an office clerk in the Textile Company since my graduation . I do a lot of things , such as typing , handling the daily correspondence , arranging meetings and so on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be frank , not very much , because I can ’ t use much what I ’ Ve learned in my work . I enjoy doing more challenging work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , according to your experience , perhaps you could tell me what essential qualities a personnel department office clerk should maintain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . First of all , she must have a strong sense of responsibility .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She must be an honest person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She must also be diligent and do a lot of things on her own initiative .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . The work includes keeping the files . Have you got any practical experience with that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , no . But I took related courses . I can gain experience quickly . I ’ m sure I can do the job well .
segments.speaker: S1
